text: Pseudodrephalys sohni is commonly found in Amazonas, Brazil. ==References== *http://www.ftp.funet.fi/index/Tree_of_life/insecta/lepidoptera/ditrysia/hesperioidea/hesperiidae/pyrginae/pseudodrephalys/index.html#atinas *http://entomology.si.edu/StaffPages/BurnsJ.htm Category:Pyrgini Category:Taxa named by John Burns (entomologist) fr:Pyrginae
title: Pseudodrephalys sohni
